content.detailedDescription: I saw in the night sky bright lights moving from left to right. i dont know if it went all the way around but it was in a continuous motion.  there was a humming/like sound that could not be identified from a specific direction. it moved slow and went past my vision (blocked by a building. by the time i moved to track the lights there were gone.
content.summary: Ufo in buena park, ca.

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside the night because my brother said there was a ufo. so i went outside and then they showed me the weird thing in the sky. at first i didn't believe it but then i came to realize that it couldn't have been a plane because it wasn't moving and the lights were in a crescent shape which meant that it might have been circular and on the top of it was a red light flashing. there were at least 8-10 lights in the crescent on the bottom and the lights went in a flashing order from first to last but very fast. then i went into my house to get the vc but by the time i came out it was gone.

the picture i included is a representation of the sighting. the sky was much more lighter and there were not as many stars. the lights flashed from the bottom left first dot to the bottom right and disappeared for a while " i suppose while it went around the other side" and did this for the time that we watched it. during this time the red dot at the top also flashed. the picture is also a close up. the distance was much farther and the dots were much smaller.

this is what i got so far and if you have any questions just ask.
content.summary: Circular ufo with lights.

content.detailedDescription: Some friends of mine and me, we where on the beach, it was a summer warm night, it was late at night and we were going to go back home, so when we where beside our cars one of us said: what's that?,i said: an airplane i think, my friend says: i don't think so, ist so high and its going so fast. i have to say that it wasnt a lineal flight, it was like drawing eights. that's happend in a 30 seconds aprox. then, that light with a cigarr form, stay suspended on air for a couple of minutes,and with a higher light disappear.
content.summary: Very fast very lightly and it disappear in a second after stay suspended on air over 30 sec.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving on the westbound 101 around 8pm in the reseda, california area when i spotted a blindingly bright light hovering off to the right side of the freeway. at first i thought it may have been a plane flying in my direction at an extremely low altitude. then the object began to descend straight down, a small but noticeable distance, and continue to hover over the residential area of reseda. i turned to by boyfriend in the passenger seat and told him i knew what i was looking at.

at this time a freeway sound wall blocked our view while i was driving in the inside lane. i quickly shifted to the fast lane and waited for the object to come back into view. the object had to be relatively low in the sky if the sound wall and tree tops could easily block our view. when the object was visible again, all the bright lights had been shut off and now the craft���s anti-collision/beacon lights were blinking, and i could clearly see the outline of the unit under the full moon. disk shaped, with a protruding top and bottom, with the blinking lights arranged around the widest part of the craft. it looked as though it was made of dark grey metal since it was reflective in the moonlight.

we had driven around the craft, proving that it was stationary, and decided to circle back to get another look. in the 2 minutes that i was able to circle around back to the craft���s original location, it had moved higher up in the sky and less than a half mile west. we followed the craft by street and observed it, now stationary again, for 15 to 20 minutes. every now and then we would see the lights on the craft dim and brighten, then descend straight down and hover. on the crafts��� low-light��� setting; we could see multiple colored lights blinking at different times. when it began to move further west, we followed again until it was just a small speck in the sky. we decided to finish our errand in reseda and head home.

we were now driving on the 101 southbound through studio city, california at about 9pm when i looked up and saw another similar-looking craft with bright lights hovering over the freeway a little higher than the treetops. as soon as i pointed in its direction, the craft took off heading north over my vehicle. again, we turned around to head north and follow but the craft had traveled a considerable distance and we decided it was too far.

i believe that i may have witnessed two separate spacecrafts. it is also possible that it was the exact same craft that i saw in two different locations when considering its speed capabilities and the time in between spotting the craft(s).
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Possible dual sighting, blindingly bright lights hovering over reseda and studio city, ca.

content.detailedDescription: This report being entered by iowa chief investigator, beverly trout.  witness phoned trout during his sighting.  while driving westbound on hwy 30, witness saw very bright star-like light/object south of him, brighter than venus or jupiter.  as he drove west, he checked to see if his van was moving past the object.  it was, so he was reassured that it was not a planet or star.  he pulled over to observe, called investigator trout. then turned off at next turn-off onto 230th street on outskirts of west ames, iowa.  drove south about 2 miles, and seemed to get closer to object, and when it stayed in same position, he turned around to head back north to hwy. 30.  on the way he stopped at house, hoping someone else could view the object, but nobody was home.  when he got back to hwy 30, he saw that object had moved to the west, and when he reached home and finally stopped watching it, object was estimated as just as bright, but was now at 20-25 degrees up from wsw horizon. witness is uncertain as to object's distance or altitude, but by extending and holding hands apart says apparent size of object was 1/4 inch, and if he includes the streaks/rays he saw surrounding object, the measurement is 2 1/2 inches.
content.summary: Light/object brighter than venus or jupiter hovering, then changed direction and moved away.

content.detailedDescription:
Fairly large, very bright, over head then quickly disappeared
very bright, does vehicle use light as energy source?

vehicle was very well delineated
1:returning from supper
2:straight ahead
3:bright star
4:remainedd directly overhead
5:suddenly began becoming smaller (moving away?) and disappeared
content.summary: Seen close to moon very bright, then quickly disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
L am a 61 yr old male and l have never seen a ufo or was ever really interested in them. what l want to tell you is that in nov. l had a heart attack and almost died. during that time in the hospital l had what l thought where bad dreams or nightmares. but those dreams kept getting longer and more detailed. this is the facts of that day in 1959.
      on the morning of june 11, 1959, while visiting my older sister in victorville ca. a kid that l had become pals with invited me to go jack rabbit hunting in the desert. we had an old jalopy that was the kids uncles. we both had 22 rifles and jugs of water and pbnj sandwiches for the day. we headed out towards the dump near travis afb. we shot at and missed a few rabbits. we started to look at the items in the dump, the majority of the stuff was discarded air force stuff like old helmets and oxygen masks and what l thought was jet parts. at about 10:00 we stopped and had some water and a sandwich. suddenly a man appeared from nowhere he was just standing there in front of us about 10 feet away. there was nothing for him to be hiding behind or jump out from. this is what he looked like he was very tall, about 7 ft and almost skinny very slender and he had long reddish blonde hair, and a beard that was the same color.
 his complextion was fair, like that of a person who didnt go out in the sun. he was smiling at us he had big white teeth, and the bluest eyes that l have ever seen. and he shimmered or his clothes did. tim and l were sitting there frozen to the ground. and then he spoke he said hello.
tim and l both said hello back. now l want you to know that for almost 50 yrs all that l had remembered was the hunting trip and the dump and going home, but after my near death expereince the memories expanded.
content.summary: Had an encounter with an et.

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my girlfriend were leaving her house to go to dinner just after 8:00pm at woodlake ave. and saticoy blvd. both of us were seated in my convertible with the top down. i remember there were terrible brush fires just to the north of us near santa clarita and the smell of smoke was heavy in the air. before i started my car to back out of her driveway i noticed a unusualy large object in the north east sky that caught my attention. i have always been an airplane buff, i spent hours as a kid listening to my aircraft radio, always at the end of some runway, always one eye toward the sky, built untold plastic models. so i know planes and can spot and classify military aircraft on sight. i have been to untold air shows and really enjoy the most exotic of aircraft and what i saw that friday evening frightened the hell out of me. i pointed it out to my girlfriend and she asked what it was, i replied, "looks like a friggin' ufo to me babe!" just between hers and her neighbors house low in the northeastern sky from up here in the foothills an absolutely enormous v shaped craft was lazily headed due north, it's lack of forward speed almost suggested a lighter than air vehicle if it was a reasonably sized craft, but i knew what i was seeing was either a distorted sense of scale, or this "v" had to be several hundreds of feet across minimum! there were numerous red lights visible from the lower rear three quarters degree view we had, so we were at it's "8 o clock low" from it's vantage. as far as the number of lights i cannot say for certain, i am now uncertain if they lined the forward leading edge perimeter, or were line abreast, across the bottom surface, (ventral) at right angle to the center line on the v. there was a reddish glow emeinating or reflecting off of the bottom, almost a shimmering, with some intricate fine detail barely visible underneath through the reddish glow i first attributed to reflection from the nearby forrest fire. there were no visible means of propulsion evident. i cannot stress the lumberingly slow movement of this object away from us and when it passed behind a neighbors leafless tree i quickly sped 30 feet out of the driveway to gain a better onobstructed vantage again, away from the tree, no more than 5 seconds, it was gone! i could not see any possible obstruction that could have prevented visual re acquisition. it just vanished! my girlfriend remembers being very aware then of numerous private and light commercial traffic in the sky, as there is always in the vicinity of the van nuys airport. i had this impression as well but feel it was a result of such intense target fixation observing the object then having no stimulus directly forward tends to widen your perception from the tunnel vison we experienced. we humans are preditors by nature with both eyes fixed forward for expanded depth perception, keyed to movement. i wish i could say i photographed my sighting, but there are seldom good cameras when you need them around. i did make a crude animated .Gif file the very next day to try and record the event to the best of my and my gf's recolection.

i didn't come forward earlier because i have always scoffed and outwardly derided people who have claimed to have witnessed things like i now have. i didn't want to be,"one of those people" but i am now. i'm not going to pilgramage out to roswell or anything or claim abduction stories, but i will share what i saw, and know to be seen by at least me and my girlfriend. thank god she was there to back me up! lastly, this was above a major population area of more than 1.8 million in the valley alone, within easy visual range of one of the busiest private avaition airports in the world, van nuys airport. it doesn't add up?
content.summary: Very large v shaped with red lights visible underneath in san fernando valley

content.detailedDescription:
At about 300 am i left my tent in the sage creek wilderness of the bad lands national park to "do my business". the sky was absolutely clear and visability was unlimited. standing on top of a small knoll on the high
prarie i was looking due south when i noticed a bright spherical object on a low trajectory moving slowly west to east approximately 5 miles away. it was about 5 to 10 degrees above the horizon when it dropped below a small hill.
i was in air force tactical aircrew for 7 years an can identify most of the worlds aircraft and can tell a satelite from an aircraft. this was niether and as there was no airfields for a 100 miles in that direction i found it very disconcerting.
content.summary: Bright object over the bad lands.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were at the park.  the wind was high and we were walking the dogs.  we go to the park a lot mostly so i can fly my rc airplanes but the wind was too strong.   after walking the dogs we were about to leave and i decided to take some radom pictures of the sky.  in the first picture you can see the object.  the next picture was taken just a second later as i moved the camera only slightly to take another picture.  the object did not appear in the second shot.  we did not see or hear anthing. the strange thing about this shot is that of a report i filed earlier last year we were standing in the opening between the trees in the picture and a star like object came from the south to the same position and stoped.  it stayed in that same spot for about 15 min then faded away.  if the report can be checked i think it was at about the same time of day.
content.summary: Taking random pictures in the park caught saturn like object.

content.detailedDescription: i was driving in nebraska on highway 80 going west near after grand island when i looked to the sky and noticed a big circular object moving at a high speed. it was bright green and glowing and was a little smaller than the size of the sun. i had no idea what it was  when i first noticed it because it was too big to be anything identifiable. it seemed to be over 10000 ft high but no higher than 14000. i spotted it midway in the sky and it quickly sank below the horizon never to be seen again. i didnt even see it for more than 45 seconds. i was stunned when i saw it and immediatly thought it was a ufo. i was excited and scared and looked all around for other signs of ufo's. i considered calling the highway patrol but knew they would do nothing about it.
content.summary: A bright green ufo fell from the sky to the horizon.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my balcony as i always do to smoke a black and mild cigar and i remember being on the phone as i looked in the sky i noticed this bright star-like object but some what bigger of course cause it was closer in distance.  i froze, it seemed to be flashing, it sped away to a roof top across the way, stopped for about 7 seconds and disappeared into thin air.  i couldn't believe my eyes.  it took me a minute to adjust, i started banging on the sliding balcony doors calling for my fiance i told him what i had seen but of course he was in disbelief.  that is until we heard from two other people that we knew in the apartment complex that they had witnessed the same thing.  oh yeah, i hung up on the person i was speaking to out of reaction.  i couldn't believe what i was seeing.
content.summary: The weirdest thing i ever witnessed but i believe it to be a ufo.

content.detailedDescription:
my name is {pid}, i'am 18 years old male from scotch plains,new jersey and am currently on vaction in pasadena,california living at my uncle's house. ive always been a believer in ufos and ever since my first encounter ive been addicted to them.Two days ago at apoximetly 6 pm i was on my uncle's balcony gazing west at the beautiful view of the mountains when i noticed something bright in the sky hovering for atleast an hour to an hour and a half. i knew it could not be a plane nor a helicopter because it did not contain the blinking red lights that transmite their locations to the faa. with that in mind i thought it had to be a star. so i went to go and grab my camera, i have a 
panasonic pv-gs400 
which features
12x optical zoom with optical stabalizer.
700x digital zoom
allows manual controls over these features: focus, exposure, shutter speed, aperture, white balance, mic sensitivity
leica dicomar lens
tape format: minidv
still photo resolution: 2288 x 1728 pixels.
ive always let my curriousity get the best of me because ive always known that there's always gonna be something special at the end of it. what i saw next was unbelieveable because never in my life have i ever seen anything like what i saw. at first it looked like a pyramid with 4 dots on it.I then realized that my camera had the option of 700x digital zoom instead of the standered 250x i imediatly switched it to 700x, and what i saw next amazed me beyond belief. it seemed like it had a sphere camera in the center of it or an eyeball,as i kept recording i noticed my battery was running out and died withing the next 10 mins of filming. as i previously mentioned im here on vaction and my brother had left the battery charger back home in jersey. this upseted me very much because i knew i was not going to be able to analyze the video that i just recorded. so the next day i did some research to see if anybody had witnessed what i had by going on google and youtube and typing in blue ufo/pyramids i went through a good amount of websites/video's untill one caught my eye. it was a blueish type pyramid exactly like mine, i clicked on the video and was amazed yet again. it was identical to my unidentified flying object except that it was filmed in russia and that his camera might have not been as good as mine. i will include my video links with this video including the one the russian guy filmed. by the way the ufo has been showing up here every night since i first filmed it around 5 or 6 pm.
thank you for your time
{pid}

the video the russian guys video filmed on june  06 2007
http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=ugwh1_zekmm&feature=channel_page

here are my video's filmed january 8 2009
http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=nhb2mdc7sp8&feature=channel_page
http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=a_qovqpfwyo&feature=channel
http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=2gcr5-pinhq&feature=channel

here are some websites my videos have been put on.
http://aliencasebook.Blogspot.Com/2009/01/videos-ufo-footage-over-pasadena.Html
http://alienufoparanormal.Aliencasebook.Com/2009/01/11/videos--ufo-footage-over-pasadena-california--january-8-2009.Aspx
content.summary: Very bright blueish in color  hovering moving every 30 min to hour

content.detailedDescription:
I was home watching tv. to my left is a large window about 6 feet wide and 4 feet high. the drapes were partly closed. it looks towards the ssw. there is complete darkness near my house. a few hundred yard away is a cliff that is from about 100 to 250 feet high.
my attention was taken by something that has left me completely awestruck. i saw what i can best describe as if someone took a 10-story building with scaffolding on the outside of it, and the scaffolding had rows or striated lights aimed at the building, and the whole thing went over my home from behind my field of view and then out of view.
i was too amzed to move and then i decided to call {pid}. i have been the animal control officer in aberdeen, wa for 15 years. i knew him when he was an aberdeen officer. i knew he investigated ufo's.
i looked up his number but i got it wrong. it took about 10 minutes for me to get hold of him.
i have lived here for 13 years.
i know exactly what i can see and what is usual around my home.
this was beyond anything i have ever seen.
i don't know what shape it was because it filled the window. i couldn't see the edges of it it was so large.
it took from 1 1/2 to 2 seconds to go out of view.
content.summary: Massive lit-up structure flew over my home

content.detailedDescription:
I was at venice beach, lying in the sand on my back. i was just looking up at the sky when i noticed a round, circular object moving pretty quickly through the sky at what seemed a very high altitude. it was moving the opposite way the wind was going. it went in a very straight line it seemed at first, then i noticed it was arcing slightly more out to sea. the object seemed to be following along the coastline, going from north to south. it just seemed so high, and looked big from where i was. so to be that large from my position, it must have been very large.
    so that is what was curious. what is so large, just round, would fly through the sky...Way to big to be a balloon drifting. that is what i first thought it had to be. but it was way to big to be a balloon. just perfectly round it seemed. and it must have been going at a pretty good speed too. not real real fast. maybe as fast as an airplane would look at the same height. but this was no airplane. the large whitish gray, very round, shape was very very plain to see. a huge round object, not a balloon!!
   i watched it until i could no longer see it. it went down the coast a bit then headed out towards sea. very clear sunny day...Just a few super thin wispy clouds left by some airplanes were the only clouds. it just disappeard from view eventually. i think  it was really something strange...Not a usual flying machine!!
content.summary: I saw a whitish grey round object, seemed very high, moving across the sky in a straight path.

content.detailedDescription: We were walking home just after midnight from grabbing some food and i saw a very bright orange light.  and i turned to my boyfriend and said check that out, i dont think its a plane because planes have red or white lights and this was much closer.  as we stared we noticed that the orange light was very bright and pulsed and heading northwest to southeast, towards us.  the first one stopped, stood still for a few seconds and then heading west. there was a second one behind it, just as bright orange as the first. it was coming from the same direction. it then stopped in place. did a quick square flight pattern, and headed west(was gone pretty quickly once heading west).  the duration was about 2 min and there was absolutely no sound whatsoever associated w/ the ufo's, but yet they were close enough that if it was a plane,helicopter, we would have heard some sort of engine sound associated with it.  my boyfriend is very skeptical, but he said it was like nothing he has ever seen before. the color was just such a bright rich orange color and the flight pattern was very akward.  i have no idea what it was, i just know it was a first that i have seen something like this.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2 bright orange lights-2 separate objects.

content.detailedDescription: While flying back from las vegas to portland, oregon on an alaska airlines flight i witnessed 3 white circular discs flying in a perfect unison.  we were almost to portland and were flying over the mountains; i would say we were between central oregon and mt. hood area.  it was sunny and not a cloud in the sky.  i was looking out the window directly below staring at the green forested mountains.  what i saw stood out because they were white and really contrasted with the green mountains.  it was 3 white circular shaped discs flying in a perfect unison.  we were flying north and these were traveling so much faster (like 2-3 times faster than us) going in the opposite direction.  i only saw them for about 10 seconds as they passed and were no longer in sight.  they flew one in front of the other.  they were so close together that it was almost hard to see 3 objects but i could. it was nothing i have ever seen in my life.  the first feeling i had was this is not manmade. it was just too perfect.  i could clearly see no wings from a jet and there was no trail that a jet would leave.  we had not began our descent yet so we must have been at least 30-35,000 feet.  these objects were far below; maybe 10-15,000 feet? i didn't think of asking the flight crew after we landed.  i was so shocked and just talked with my husband about it. to this day i can not get this sighting out of my mind. i also reported it to the national ufo reporting center.
content.summary: 3 white circular objects flying closely together.

content.detailedDescription: My mom was playing manhunt at night when she was a kid.  all of a sudden a white light speeds in directly over my mom and her four friends. note it is directly about 20 - 35 feet above them.  my mom yelled and ran back to her house across the street.  her cousin though had a flashlight and moved it up to see the light. my mom had just reached her house.  unfornetly my mothers cousin never spoke about that night, and to the present day has never mentioned it. to his day my mother still does not know what it was and though she is a debunker of this phenomena she can not explain it other than it was truly an unidentified flying object.
content.summary: Light on beach

content.detailedDescription: People i have been watching these ufo activities all summer long over here in eastlake, ohio. the crafts leave lake erie around 12:30am and go onto land and disperse into different directions. north to south and even south east. i saw 2 crafts the shape of a hexagon traveling together back to the lake lake slowly decending at lower altitude. i have seen different styles of unknown origin, comming back to the lake at night also. i work in the aerospace business and these are not ours. on july 15,08  a craft flew in to left of me and fastly and floated and hovered in mid-air in my view. i knew what it was. it was non-hostile and i felt the heat comming off the craft. it changed from a limelight color to a light blue and then a bright white. it was watching me and it was curious of me. it was about 500ft.High. and non hostile. the duration of the activity was about 5 minutes. then the craft whiteness slowly disipated down and i could see the make of the craft.It was was lightly transparent triangle with 2 huge white bulbs on the back end of the craft. then the craft moved in mid-air once to build up power but not once but 3 times to build up power.Then it shot off as a purplelish red ball of light. the craft then took off pretty fast because with a wobble. it headed towards route 306 at a fast clip. i say it traveled from my head to 306 in 2 seconds which it about 1 mile away.
content.summary: People they are visaully showing themselves to us!

content.detailedDescription: I was flying on alaska airlines from petersburg alaska to seattle washington on june 19th 2008.  it was a few minutes after 4 pm and the sound of the jets engines slowing for decent woke me up.  i glanced out my window near the back of the jet and saw what at first i thought was a reflection or glare on the window.  i observed it for a minute or two, changing my viewing position to be sure it was not glare or some kind of reflection.  i then took out my camera (sony dsc-s85) that i keep on hand at all times and took a few photos.  one photo is regular and one is negative art.  the light did not change in any way while i observed it.  it appeared to be 1000 to 3000 feet below me?  we were flying through clouds and the light would dim and brighten based on how much cloud cover there was between my eye and the object.  we had just begun decent when i saw it so we had to be at around 30,000 feet still.  i would guess that would put it around the canadian border or bellingham washington area.  i then put the photos on my laptop right away to analyze them better.  after i put my laptop away i looked out again and it was gone.  i told one of the pilots that i had photographed a strange object on the flight and he just laughed at me.
content.summary: Observed and photographed sphere from jet window.

content.detailedDescription: Sitting around a firepit last evening at approx. 10:30 p,m. we observed 6 very orange roundish lights high in the sky moving from south to north and appeared to be almost as high as an airplane would appear to be flying overhead.  their movement was very steady and they were not real close together so there didn't seem to be any particular formation.  the moon was very bright and full so we were admiring it when we saw them.  the six of us all stood mesamerized by this sigting.  by the time i ran up stairs and into the house and found my camera and found the way to turn off the flash they were going out of sight.  i would say we observed them for approx. 5 minutes.
content.summary: 6 very orange lights high in the sky made no sound moved like airplanes.

content.detailedDescription: Waiting for display at hollingdean.Watching sky suddenly appeared.Sat motionless.Slowly moved n.E .Swift turn to east and dissapeared from view.
content.summary: Waiting for fireworks display to start saw bright orange ball approx.  5 times size of venus in sky.

content.detailedDescription: This happened at some point in june in the year 2006. my family and i were going home from a cruise in the caribbean. during the flight from fort lauderdale to salt lake city i looked out my window and noticed a black object when i looked down to see the landscape. it looked like one of the seeds you get stuck on you clothes while walking through tall grass (http://en.Wikipedia.Org/wiki/poa) but it had several longer spike like protrusions coming off the back of it about the same length as the main part of the object, as far as i could see there were no lights or windows on it, just a reflectionless black hull. it didn't seem to be changing altitude or distance to the plane. i told the passenger next to me, they looked and did not notice it. the closest man made vehicle i know of to what this looked like is the f-117 nighthawk stealth fighter but the object was too different to be an f-117. it stayed with us for quite a while, i eventually stopped watching and every once in a while i'd take a look and there it was right in the same place as last time but the last time i looked i didn't see it anymore. wish i could have gotten a closer look but it didn't happen and i didn't have binoculars or anything to give me a better view.
content.summary: Black object sighted midflight between fort lauderdale and salt lake city.

content.detailedDescription: I am not a ufo person.  i do not believe in ufos or aliens or all that abduction nonsense but what i recently saw scared the hell out of me.  i woke up at about 4 am and decided to go to the local 24hr drugstore to get some snacks.  i usually don't go out this late but my neighborhood is pretty safe and quiet so i didn't think much of it.  i was walking down the street, which is fully lit with streetlamps and security lights so i wasn't thinking about anything weird happening when i saw it.  it was a huge, disc like object hovering in the sky with multiple lights flashing.  i ignored it immediately, thinking it was a plane and just kept going on my way.  a few seconds later, i look up and see this thing flying back and forth, making turns that i know no plane can make and still i'm not thinking anything unusual.  i keep walking toward the store when i see a parked police car on the corner.  the officer is outside his car looking up at this thing that is just all over the place, making maneuvers that seem impossible and flashing brightly colored lights before hovering at a dead stop.  the officer and i stop and stare in amazement at this thing, whatever it was in the sky before it suddenly took this dramatic vertical takeoff until we could no longer see it.  this was one of the weirdest things i'd ever seen, and i'm still trying to shake this off.  again, i do not believe in ufos and there's a part of me that wants to believe this was a plane but i don't know.
content.summary: Flashing triangle that scared me out of my wits.

content.detailedDescription: At approximatley 2-3pm while driving to work from the north west on highway 95 i noticed a very bright star like object hovering and changing shapes and very bright! i have been observing these objects for the past 2yrs and have recoreded these events i know what they are and i feel its time to talk about it i have many times tryed to make contact by useing a very bright light to signal them sometime they respond....There is so much activity here i dont know why we dont have somebody from mufon down here? i know where they will appear but i dont know why.I see them all the time i have a back groung in police trainning and have worked in the security field for 17yrs with basic fbi,,doj clearances.. my wife who doesnt want to believe in this has been a wittness to some of my recordings of these events i hope to here from somebody soon i have talked to mark in reno... but thats all thank you for your time and consideration i have alot to talk about regarding our alien brothers..I cant attach any photos they are all on my video cam and cell phone. the sightings are happening all the time now... big bright star like crafts are appearing all the time.
content.summary: Driving to work a star like object changing sizes then vanished and appeared several times during the whole event.

content.detailedDescription:
i think i saw ufo !

  watch this news-video  http://www.Krone.Tv/krone/s160/object_id__128702/kmwebtv/index.Html
and from 12 to 14 seconds of video you can notice ufo in right upper corner !

  what do you think about that?
content.summary: Read details!

content.detailedDescription: I was born in 1956 and i think i was around 11 or 12 years old. my father and i used to sit out at night a listen to the radio, it was at the time of the song,,,in the year 2525,,,was playing.,,,,anyhow my mother had a friend over to visit..A very good witness....As i sat in my lawn chair,,there was a ,,disk,,as it came over me ,,,and got as large as 3/4 of the sky..And continued to go on behind me..It was not fast and was not slow,,,but it did not have a tail or sound and was an orange or red and glowed from the inside out..It scared me so bad,,i thought it was the ''end of time''..I actualy started crying...And i have witneses...Anyhow,,my father was right beside me and did not see it,,,it was only a moment.I am serious and it is a fact,,,,this is the first time  to actually report this to anyone who would listen.{pid}i know it sounds crazy,,,,but a friend of mine and i were on our bikes ,,,one afternoon and saw two ,,ufos,,that sparkled,,the first was red and right behind it was a green and both,,,sparkled,,a fact,,only up the street from where i live and saw the first one,,my friend is a witness...This was a year or two later. a real fact on both accounts,,sincerly, mark freeman
content.summary: A red disk that flew over without a tail and glowed from the inside out.

content.detailedDescription:
Came out of my house which faces southwest.  observed a bright orange/yellow sort of pulsating orb.  thought it was the usual philly air traffic but this light bobed around like a balloon in the same general spot.  did not move like a stationary airplane.  first thing that came to mind was the skeptics good old chinese lantern except the orange glow was not inside something like that.  there was a light snow/freezing rain and the visibility was about 9 miles which put it in the direction of palmyran, pennsauken and cinnaminson, nj and philadelphia.  the airport is about 28 miles from where i am at and i could not observe any other air traffic like i usually do.  it was in the direction of the landing pattern but about 10 miles or less closer to my house (used visibility of 9 miles)  the flight pattern is further than that for the air traffic into philly.   i took out binoculars and the ufo/orb was clear in them.
after a couple of minutes it got smaller and disappeared. in my opinion this was an unidentified object.  i look up into the skies every day and night to train my eyes and look for abnormalities, so i am confident this was something out of the ordinary.
content.summary: Orange yellow orb floating in same spot.

content.detailedDescription: I was watching the full moon rise and noticed what looked like a satellite crossing the sky it was brightly lit from the full moon as it crossed the sky from sw to ne and was fading of two very bright objects appeared from no ware and hovered then flew of towards the sw these where not satellites the was star like very large and bright.. very exiting! there was a another person with me who also seen the same thing.
content.summary: 2 very bright objects flying together.

content.detailedDescription:
On january 8, 2009 at  6:09 p.M. cst i went out my kitchen door to take the trash out. the door faces east. the moon was just about full that evening. out of the corner of my eye, i noticed a strange ���������cloud��������� to my right. it was strange enough that i turned to look at it.

it was moving from the south to the north very fast. it was about 70 -75 degrees off the horizon and dark grey. the shape is what first caught my attention. imagine an iphone lying flat but there was a large ���������dome shape��������� under it and in the middle of the rectangle. the ���������dome��������� seemed to have several lobes on it so it was not perfectly smooth.  in fact the whole object was about the size of an iphone held at arm���������s length. there was only one object.

it did not make any sound. in fact i would say the silence was ���������deafening��������� in the same way it is quiet after a large snowfall. 

the moon was quite bright and the edges of the object seemed to glow from the moonlight rather than an internal source. the object obstructed the view of stars as it flew by.

i walked down the side path to the front of my house to keep the object in view. it continued straight north. the speed and altitude did not alter. i continued to watch it until it disappeared from view. there were no aircraft in the area at the time.

the sky was clear that except for a few wispy, white clouds that are shaped more like long pencils. i watched the object fly under the clouds and noted that the object was not only moving in the opposite direction of the clouds, but it was going much faster than the clouds. it moved fast enough that i knew i did not have time to get my camera. plus it was dark enough that i was not sure the object would photograph.

my dog was outside with me and he started barking when the object was in front of me. 

i watched the object for approximately one minute before i could no longer see it.

i was home alone. i am a mom and a business owner. unfortunately, i did not see any of my neighbors outside who i could ask to witness the object.

the next night i looked up at the sky watching the clouds move. i realized that the moonlight hitting the edges of the clouds was rather diffuse. the object i saw on january 8 was enveloped by moonlight that was quite bright ��������� as though the object reflected the moonlight. but the object did not seem to be shiny to me at the time of sighting.
content.summary: At 18:09 on 1/8/08 i saw a rectangular shaped ufo move from south to north.
